oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The preparation of tinder. In the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V.10. 4761 rev.4764 rev., note). Tinder–making, by |han≠kass’o (L VIII.-28. 8472 and 8473). Tinder is made from a certain thorn tree (called !kou). 1) This story is found in Book V-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The preparation of tinder from a certain thorn tree
